view

Class ViewFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.ViewFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IView

    public class ViewFacade
extends Object
implements IView

    The Class ViewFacade provides a facade of the View component.

    Since:
    jre1.8.0_151
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Nathan Beer nathan.beer@viacesi.fr
